name: STORN
paper: Variational Inference for On-Line Anomaly Detection in HighDimensional Time Series.
description: Stochastic Recurrent Network (STORN) appraoch used to learn and detect anomalies on robot time series data. Overall, the objective is to learn a generative time series model of the data, which can handle high-dimensional, spatially and temporally structured data.
bibtex: @article{Slch2016VariationalIF,title={Variational Inference for On-line Anomaly Detection in High-Dimensional Time Series},author={Maximilian S{"o}lch and Justin Bayer and Marvin Ludersdorfer and Patrick van der Smagt},journal={ArXiv},year={2016},volume={abs/1602.07109},}
